page.title: 06FIELD SPORTS, BURSTON AREA
page.content:
There is very little scope for leisure activities in this area. Hunting, shooting and fishing are available during the season.
The Trent and Mersey Canal provides fishing and canal cruising. This creates a small amount of tourist trade at the Greyhound Public House. Fishing is confined to a pool, which is leased to a factory Angling Club, and to the towpath of the canal under licence.
The North Staffs. Hunt meet and ride over some of the fields, and as most of the land belongs to one landlord, the pheasant shoot is leased out privately.
